original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 6-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices fell by more than 6 percent for the second week at an auction last week, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 73,367.88 from 78,225.84 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority on April 06.
The highest price was 85,100 rupees for 1,000 nuts up from the previous week’s 85,000 rupees, while the lowest was 65,000 down from 74,000 rupees.
The auction offered 1,394,310 coconuts and 1,005,534 nuts were sold.
The next auction will be held on April 20, after the New Year holidays, Coconut Development Board said. (Colombo/April12/2023)
